summary_md: Romania, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 12,493 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 5.72% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 5.38% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 76.61 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 89.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 35.60% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.labor_md: The labor market shows an unemployment rate of 5.38% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the general employment situation.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Romania is at 89.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), reflecting the country's digital infrastructure.
